title: Book of Hours, Use of Rome
additional_titles: Calendar|Gospel Lessons|Ownership inscription, in Italian|Hours of the Virgin, Use of Rome|Hours of the Cross|Hours of the Holy Spirit|Hours of the Virgin for Advent and Christmastide|Penitential Psalms, Litany, and Prayers|Office of the Dead|Credo, in French ("La foy et créance des bons créstiens," in a different hand)|Prayer, "Ave cuius conceptio...," in a different hand|Prayer, "Deus qui nos conceptionis...," in a different hand|Obsecro te|Prayer, in French, "O mon dieu et créateur trèspuissant...," followed by the Prayer to Christ on the Seven Words spoken from the Cross, "Domine Ihesu Christe qui septem verba in ultima hora..."|Rhyming prayer, in French, "Ung seul dieu to créateur, tu serviras et ameras..."|Suffrage to Saint John the Evangelist|Suffrage to Saint Anthony|Suffrage to Saint Catherine|Suffrage to Saint Margaret|Prayers to the Virgin, "Conceptio tua dei genitrix virgo...," "Ora pro nobis sanctissima filii dei genetrix...," and "Omnipotens clementissime deus...," in a different hand
